Psycholinguistics: Consciousness - an Optimality Theory Approach.
Cosme R.
January 2015
 

Based on the "Dvaita Vada Philosophy of Vaisnavism"(Prabhupada, 1972) the purpose of this article is to describe the caracteristics of "consciousness".
